mechanics.trigger: Target would drop to 0 hit points
mechanics.condition: Condition is a result of taking damage AND spell is active
mechanics.outcome: Target instead drops to 1 hit point; spell ends

mechanics.trigger: Target is subjected to an effect that would kill it instantaneously
mechanics.condition: Effect does NOT deal damage AND spell is active
mechanics.outcome: Effect is negated against the target; spell ends

description_text: You touch a creature and grant it a measure of protection from death. The first time the target would drop to 0 hit points as a result of taking damage, the target instead drops to 1 hit point, and the spell ends. If the spell is still in effect when the target is subjected to an effect that would kill it instantaneously without dealing damage, that effect is instead negated against the target, and the spell ends.
